import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Stats } from 'src/app/interface/stats'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stats', templateUrl: './stats.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stats.component.css'] }) export class StatsComponent { @Input() stats: Stats; }
{{ stats?.totalCustomers }} Total Customers
{{ stats?.totalInvoices }} Total Invoices
${{ stats?.totalBilled }} Total Billed
